Topic.Title: The Real Big Change Marissa Mayer Is Bringing To Yahoo!

Message.Msg: Yahoo looks good for the rest of this year.

Message.Title: The power of patents
Message.Msg: Why do Apple's patents have value & Yahoo's do not???
Good question. And why was there such an outcry against Yahoo with its FB suit; yet, Apple gets respect for its suit and the money recovered from for its intellectual property??

Message.Msg: new message board stinks - just like the stock. I'm beginning to hate this company!

Topic.Title: Is the New Message Board Format Better than the Old?

Message.Msg: How are you able to give yourself stars?

Message.Title: NEWFORMATSUKSDIK
Message.Msg: The douche who made that decision should be fired and executed

Message.Title: Throwing out the baby with the bath water - Yahoo MB Format
Message.Msg: No URL’s to cut down on SPAM. Well the true spam I have seen all had multiple alias that were yahoo accounts. Sounds like an account creating issue not a URL link issue. I cannot copy and paste a message and keep any formatting or even create format within the text posting form. Did you get a geico caveperson to do the programming for the Stone Age text formatting capability? Most people these days are computer literate and computers are smarter. People creating programs are become more computer illiterate. Dumbing-down the software to the point that it impedes efficiency. Microsoft using more hieroglyphs instead of simple menus with text words is a good example. I can use a dictionary to find out what “File” means. I have no way to find out what a finger painted icon created by a programmer’s two old means. I have no interest in memorizing an Icon library equivalent to the Chinese alphabet. Computers should be past the point of caveman pictures.

Message.Title: YAHOO LOSING MESSAGE BOARD PARTICIPANTS WITH NEW FORMAT
Message.Msg: I liked the old format. This new format is full of bugs and annoyances. I don't like the fact they did away with the red star rating system. Fewer message threads can be displayed on a page, so it takes longer to scan. GO BACK TO THE OLD SYSTEM SOME CHANGE IS BAD. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE.
